question: In namespace limit create a Pod named resource-checker using image httpd:alpine with container name my-container; requests: cpu=30m, memory=30Mi; limits: cpu=300m, memory=30Mi.
suggested_answer:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: resource-checker
  namespace: limit
spec:
  containers:
  - name: my-container
    image: httpd:alpine
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 30m
        memory: 30Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 300m
        memory: 30Mi
